mapper.select: select r.rId, P_ID as pId, r.loginID, rStar, `rLike`, rTitle, rContent, DATE_FORMAT(rDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as rDate, likeChk from REVIEW r left outer join REVEIW_LIKE l on r.rId= l.rId and l.loginID = #{loginId} where P_ID=#{pId} LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
select count(rId) from REVIEW where P_ID=#{pId}
